items.title: Pope prays at site of 2020 port explosion, consoles relatives of victims
items.description: Pope Leo XIV has concluded his first foreign trip with a farewell speech in Beirut, referencing the ongoing conflict in southern Lebanon

items.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to host Cabinet meeting at White House on Tuesday
items.description: Trump is also set to make an announcement at 2 p.m. ET, the White House said.

items.title: White House is 'very optimistic' ahead of Russia-US meeting on ending Ukraine war
items.description: Special envoy Witkoff and Jared Kushner is scheduled to meet Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

items.title: WATCH:  Bear enjoys fresh snowfall at Chicago zoo
items.description: A resident bear at Brookfield Zoo Chicago took delight in the fresh snowfall over the weekend, rolling around in the snow.
